thread.title: 'Refuse Fascism' Activist vs. Tucker Carlson: Trump Is More Dangerous Than Hitler
thread.title_full: 'Refuse Fascism' Activist vs. Tucker Carlson: Trump Is More Dangerous Than Hitler

title: 'Refuse Fascism' Activist vs. Tucker Carlson: Trump Is More Dangerous Than Hitler
text:
'Refuse Fascism' Activist vs. Tucker Carlson: Trump Is More Dangerous Than Hitler | Posted By Tim Hains On Date February 22, 2017 
FNC's Tucker Carlson debates Sunsara Taylor, an protest organizer with 'Refuse Facism Now' about whether Donald Trump is a fascist. Taylor makes the case that because Donald Trump has Twitter and nuclear weapons he is more dangerous than Hitler was. "This is a danger to humanity. And yes, it's in its early stages, but people need to rise up and stop it before it is too late," Sunsara Taylor of 'Refuse Fascism' said Tuesday. "He is more dangerous than Hitler ever could have been. I'm calling for mass political protest and resistance." "You don't oppose fascism with political resistance. But whatever. You may not know that," Carlson laughingly told her. Related Videos
